src:
Šved pohvalio Gavrilovića i Zvezdu
01 Nov 2019, 10:58 by Nemanja
Košarkaš Himkija Aleksej Šved pohvalio je trenera Crvene zvezde i njegove igrače na pruženoj partiji i pobedi u sinoćnoj utakmici Evrolige.
Šved i njegova ekipa nisu imali rešenja za raspoložene crveno-bele pred ispunjenim tribinama hale ,,Aleksandar Nikolić“, a najbolji igrač ruskog tima je imao samo reči hvale za utakmicu koju je domaćin odigrao.
– Sarađivao sam Gavrilovićem pre pet godina. Večeras je odradio odličan posao. Zvezda je igrala agresivnije od nas, zaista su bili veoma dobri – rekao je Šved nakon jučerašnjeg meča.
Šuter, koji je, za njegove standarde, juče imao nešto slabije veče sa 14 postignutih poena, istakao je koliko je domaći parket prednost za Zvezdu.
– Zvezda kod kuće uvek igra odlično, pred svojima navijačima. Svaka utakmica ovde je teška. Danas su nam pokazali da mogu da pobede svakoga. Zaista imaju dobar tim. Uvek sam srećan da dođem u Beograd i da igram ovde  – istakao je Šved.

POVEZANE OBJAVE
text:
Sweden praises Gavrilovic and Zvezda
01 Nov 2019, 10:58 by Nemanja
Khimki basketball player Alexei Shved praised the Red Star coach and his players on the game provided and won last night's Euroleague game.
The Swede and his team had no solution to the mood of the red and white in front of the filled halls of the "Aleksandar Nikolic" hall, and the best player of the Russian team had only words of praise for the game the host played.
- I worked with Gavrilovic five years ago. He did a great job tonight. The star played more aggressively than us, they were really very good - said Swede after yesterday's match.
Shooter, who by his standards had a slightly weaker night yesterday with 14 points, pointed out how much home parquet was an advantage for the Star.
- The star at home always plays great, in front of his fans. Every game here is tough. Today they showed us that they can beat anyone. They really have a good team. I'm always happy to come to Belgrade and play here, ”said Swede.
